description: @BelovedProblemChild thanks, man! I saw that error and was planning on fixing it, but there were other errors too and I lost motivation and ended up unable to finish it. But I saw you fixed my version so I decided to fix the other errors too. I hope this is the last revision, it's been awesome working on and learning this song.

description: The version I uploaded turned out to be absolute dogshit so we're going back to Stephan's 12/10/22 version
title: Beat It

description:
- Lukather's guitar part during the chorus does not follow Jackson Jr.'s, instead has a power chord on the D & B string. Example: https://youtu.be/dw3AydX3OiA?t=97
- Porcaro's Roland TR-808 Drum Machine does not use the hi-hat on every quarter note, only for the beginning. Throughout the song, the hi-hat is only on the downbeat. 
- Lukather's harmonic whammy dip starts a measure early.
- Lukather's part during measures 19 to 22 has been rewritten to be on the G & B string, not the A, D & G string for ease of play. 
- Adlibs during the song have been added (Such as "Ooh!" and "Brrrrrt!" throughout).
- Eddie's solo's pick-slide has been fixed.
- Various tweaks, fixes, and improvements otherwise.
title: Beat It
